showScoreExcerpt:
But for all the skill on display, everyone has their priorities wrong, favoring mise en scène over character and reveling in effects when the only event that matters is Scrooge's transformation. Without a solid, unbreakable connection between actor and audience, it becomes a display of theatrical craft for its own sake.

Read more
